dataList.content: Whew~ You’ve certainly made a mess out there. Tell me. Who sent ya? A rival Captain? Or are you looking to collect my head for the bounty?
Haah… So you’re the boss here?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Yeah. I’m Smee, first mate of the Twinhook Pirates.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Heard ya wanted to see me. What, want an autograph?
We were last informed that you were the second-in-command.
We seek your superior. Tell us of their whereabouts.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Hook? ... That asshat has to be drowning in bottles of Fairy Wine somewhere, three sheets to the wind.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: So I pretty much run this joint. De facto and all, you know?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: And ya gotta understand our predicament. The perfume business has never been the most lucrative venture at this port, so we're just looking to branch out... A purely business decision, devised by none other than yours truly.
Understood. So you must have the information we seek.
We are in search of a certain individual held hostage by this establishment. Hand over the information regarding his whereabouts.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Hostage? Oh, what a crude choice of words. We prefer to call him our guest.
... Guest?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Yep. Well, then... how about a deal?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Tell me everything you know about Queequeg. And I'll see to it that the guest you're looking for is safely returned.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Besides, that guest of ours... He's a big shot, ain't he? LC... something's Team Leader?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Oh, and one of you's a... friend of Queequeg, right?

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: Tell me everything you know about Queequeg.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: What she's up to, who she's with, the last thing she said to you... I want to hear all of it.

dataList.title: Twinhook Pirates
dataList.content: I'm sure there's no need to remind you who's got the upper hand here.
Ha... I wish I could tell you. I really do.
